allow: Bash(python -c "import subprocess; r = subprocess.run\([''npx.cmd'', ''tree-sitter'', ''parse'', ''test/antlr_examples/helloworld.vb''], cwd=''c:/projects/VB6_lsp/tree-sitter-vb6'', capture_output=True, text=True\); print\(''STDOUT:'', r.stdout\); print\(''STDERR:'', r.stderr\)")
Bash(cmd /c "cd /d c:\\projects\\VB6_lsp\\tree-sitter-vb6 && npx tree-sitter parse test\\temp_sub1.vb")
Bash(cmd /c "cd /d c:\\projects\\VB6_lsp && C:\\Users\\zleyyij\\.cargo\\bin\\cargo.exe check && echo SUCCESS || echo FAILED")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add symbol table for semantic analysis

Implements a hierarchical symbol table that builds on the tree-sitter
parse tree to enable precise LSP features:

- Symbol types: variables, constants, procedures, types, enums, parameters
- Scope hierarchy: Module -> Procedure -> Block \(With/For/ForEach\)
- Case-insensitive lookups with O\(1\) line-based spatial indexing
- LSP handlers now use symbol table for hover, go-to-definition,
  find references, completions, and document symbols

New files:
- position.rs: SourcePosition/SourceRange with LSP conversion
- symbol.rs: Symbol, SymbolKind, Visibility, TypeInfo, ParameterInfo
- scope.rs: Scope hierarchy management
- symbol_table.rs: Main table with query methods
- builder.rs: Walks tree-sitter tree to build symbol table

Updates README to reflect completed Phase 2 milestones.
EOF
\)")
